allowedToCategorize().details: Checks if msg.sender is allowed to categorize proposals

allowedToCatgorize().details: Gets Id of member role allowed to categorize the proposal
allowedToCatgorize().return: roleId allowed to categorize the proposal

allowedToCreateProposal(uint256).details: Checks if msg.sender is allowed to create a proposal under given category

canCloseProposal(uint256).details: Checks If the proposal voting time is up and it's ready to close     i.e. Closevalue is 1 if proposal is ready to be closed, 2 if already closed, 0 otherwise!

params._proposalId: Proposal id to which closing value is being checked

categorizeProposal(uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Categorizes proposal to proceed further. Categories shows the proposal objective.

params._maxRecords: maximum number of records to claim reward for. _proposals list of proposals of which reward will be claimed.

params._categoryId: This id tells under which the proposal is categorized i.e. Proposal's Objective
params._proposalDescHash: Proposal description hash through IPFS having Short and long description of proposal

createProposalwithSolution(string,string.details: Creates a new proposal with solution

params._categoryId: This id tells under which the proposal is categorized i.e. Proposal's Objective
params._proposalDescHash: Proposal description hash through IPFS having Short and long description of proposal
params._solutionHash: Solution hash contains  parameters, values and description needed according to proposal

getPendingReward(address).details: Gets pending rewards of a member

getSolutionAction(uint256,uint256).details: Gets solution action on a proposal
getSolutionAction(uint256,uint256).return: action of a solution on a proposal

getUintParameters(bytes8).details: Gets Uint Parameters of a code
getUintParameters(bytes8).return: string value of the codeassociated amount (time or perc or value) to the code

proposal(uint256).details: Gets all details of a propsal

proposalDetails(uint256).details: Gets some details of a propsal
proposalDetails(uint256).return: proposalIdnumber of all proposal solutionsamount of votes

rejectAction(uint256).details: Provides option to Advisory board member to reject proposal action execution within actionWaitingTime, if found suspicious

setMasterAddress().details: Updates all dependency addresses to latest ones from Master

params._solutionHash: Solution hash contains  parameters, values and description needed according to proposal

submitVote(uint256,uint256).details: Submit a vote on the proposal.

triggerAction(uint256).details: Triggers action of accepted proposal after waiting time is finished

updateUintParameters(bytes8,uint256).details: Updates Uint Parameters of a code

params.code: whose details we want to update

voteTallyData(uint256,uint256).return: member vote valueadvisory board vote valueamount of votes
